name: promptpress
description: Prompt-Driven Development Tool - Track AI prompts as persistent, versioned specs

commands.title: PromptPress: Sync Code with Implementation Spec
PromptPress: Sync Implementation Spec with Design Spec
PromptPress: Implementation to Design Specification
commands.description: This prompt instructs the AI to convert a provided implementation specification into a detailed design specification, generalizing the content into a higher-level summary while remaining precise and terse, and update the implementation specification to reference the design elements it satisfies.

commands.title: PromptPress: Design to Requirements Specification
commands.description: This prompt instructs the AI to convert a provided design specification into a detailed requirements specification, generalizing the content into a higher-level summary while remaining precise and terse, and update the design specification to reference the requirements it satisfies.

commands.title: PromptPress: Apply Requirement Spec Refactoring
commands.description: This prompt refactors a requirement specification document by synchronizing and strictifying functional and non-functional requirements.

commands.title: PromptPress: Satisfy Req Spec
commands.description: Imports requirements into a design document, ensuring they are clearly defined, organized, and unambiguous.

promptpress.apiKey.description: xAI API Key (or set PROMPT_PRESS_XAI_API_KEY env var)

promptpress.model.description: AI Model to use (currently available: grok-code-fast-1; deprecated: grok-beta, grok-2-1212, grok-vision-beta)

promptpress.autoMonitor.description: Automatically monitor specs directory for changes

promptpress.enableChat.description: Enable chat interface (Apply Changes is the primary workflow)

promptpress.maxContextTokens.description: Maximum tokens to send in context

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run test:all
